EmailTemplate.subject: AERO Patent Watch - May 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Email Title May 2015
Please find a link to the Aero Patent Watch – May 2015 <http://goaero.honeywell.com/f00uG0q0R7004I2vQZXP606>. The Aero Patent Watch provides a monthly view of published or granted patents by the U.S. Patent and Trademark office by Honeywell or peer companies in our area of interest (Direct Link to Patents by Assignee <http://goaero.honeywell.com/iQuQ0ZI468q00G000Rv2X06>).
As new issues are released, prior issues are moved to the Archive <http://goaero.honeywell.com/iRuQ0ZI469q00G000Rv2X06> section. Additional Aero IP processes and background information is available at the Aero IP Community Wiki. <http://goaero.honeywell.com/SI0X2G0Rq060ZQ60400uvSa>
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Thank you, Dan Dan Gutfreund IP Process Leader Aerospace, Advanced Technology, Technology Strategy 21111 N 19th Ave (M/S 2J35A5) Phoenix, AZ 85027 Phone: +1 602 436-9030 Mobile: +1 480 258-8692 Dan.Gutfreund@Honeywell.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/CI600T0bq0uQ0ZGR2v04X06> Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2015 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
